text:
What do Rep. Thomas Massie, former Rep. Jimmy Duncan, and Roaring 20's film icon Louise Brooks possibly have in common? 

Rebels resisting extinction.

text: "(The US is) an equal opportunity bomber. There's only two qualifications to being a bombing target: You have to pose some sort of obstacle to the desires of the empire and you have to have very poor defense against aerial attacks." --Bill Blum has died at the age of 85.
author: KelleyBVlahos

text: Feeling inspired by gathering of the rogues last night w/@GarethPorter @dan_grazier @BenFreemanDC, @markperrydc @JHUWorldCrisis & more. Talking about influence and power of the Blob. We got a lot of writing to do.
author: KelleyBVlahos
